#3.3
Start the Static Analyzer
To start the Static Analyzer with the executable program "jello", move into the appropriate directory and type:  

		                    cvstatic jello 
Let's start the Static Analyzer with the program "jello" in the mock shell to the right.
Change directories to: /usr/people/guest/program.  

Use the mock shell on the right to start the Static Analyzer with the jello program.
cd /usr/people/guest/program
jello 
cvstatic jello

Sorry.  You must type cd /usr/people/guest/program  to move into the correct directory.
Sorry.  To start the Static Analyzer with your "jello" program, type: cvstatic jello
